title: description
Taio Cruz & Ludacris' Hot Rum Lemonade: A real variant of the Hot Rum Lemonade. As little as Taio Cruz & Ludacris' heart.

title: notes
Taio Cruz & Ludacris' Hot Rum Lemonade: Sugar, Lemon and a hint of ludacris.

title: pairing
Taio Cruz & Ludacris' Hot Rum Lemonade: Taio Cruz & Ludacris have it with a bad Tea and toaster strudel.

title: serving_suggestion
Taio Cruz & Ludacris' Hot Rum Lemonade: Build. Drink to the cold sounds of Break Your Heart.
